  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>SDT</catalog>
            <entry>079f1ab4-f0de-47f3-ac96-05b6dee2cf5d#1#2</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="hu">A vérszerződés</string>
            <string language="en">Compact sealed with blood</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vertrag versiegelt mit Blut</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contrat scellé avec le sang</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estojo compacto selado com sangue</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compatto sigillato con anima</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπαγής που σφραγίζεται με το αίμα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acuerdo sellado con sangre</string>
          </title>
          <language>hu</language>
          <description>
            <string language="hu">A vérszerződés képekben</string>
            <string language="en">Compact sealed with blood in photos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="hu">a magyar nép vándorlása,  vezérek,  vérszerződés,  ló,  </string>
            <string language="en">migration of Hungarian folk, bellwethers, compact sealed with blood, horse</string>
          </keyword>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Vertrag versiegelt mit Blut in den Fotos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Contrat scellé avec le sang en photos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Estojo compacto selado com sangue nas fotos</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Compatto sigillato con anima in foto</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Συμπαγής που σφραγίζεται με το αίμα στις φωτογραφίες</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Acuerdo sellado con sangre en fotos</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Migration der ungarischen Völker, Leithammel, 
verbinden versiegelt mit Blut, Pferd</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">le transfert des gens hongrois, leaders, rendent 
compacts scellé avec le sang, cheval</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">a migração de povos hungarian, carneiros-guias, 
comprime selado com sangue, cavalo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">l'espansione della gente ungherese, bellwethers, 
comprime sigillato con anima, cavallo</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">μετανάστευση του ουγγρικού λαού, bellwethers, συμπαγής 
που σφραγίζεται με το αίμα, άλογο</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">la migración de la gente húngara, bellwethers, 
condensa sellado con la sangre, caballo</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

            <string language="en">The content may be used for the sole purpose of illustration for teaching or scientific research and only for a strictly non-commercial purpose.</string>
          </description>
